titles.title: Come Go With Me To That Land Where I'm Bound

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come go with me to that land,
Come go with me to that land,
Come go with me to that land,
Where I'm bound.
Come go with me to that land,
Come go with me to that land,
Come go with me to that land,
Where I'm bound.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There is faith in that land, etc.
We'll be one in that land, etc.
We'll be one in that land, etc.
We can stand in that land, etc.
